statements: SELECT * FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT card_number, amount FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE card_number LIKE '**************1234';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks;
SELECT * FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE card_number LIKE '4%' ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, amount FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT payment_id, card_number FROM payments WHERE amount < 50;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY user_id ASC, access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY amount DESC, payment_id ASC
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE card_number LIKE '****1234%' OR amount >= 50 ORDER BY payment_id ASC
SELECT payment_id, amount, timestamp FROM payments WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT payment_id, card_number, timestamp FROM payments ORDER BY payment_id DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM flagged_attempts WHERE flag_reason = 'Fraudulent Activity';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM login_attempts WHERE success = FALSE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM flagged_attempts WHERE flag_reason = 'Fraud' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(attempt_id) AS login_attempts_count FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(attempt_id) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM payment_attempts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM payment_attempts WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE status = 'complete' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM flagged_attempts WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.payment_method, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.transaction_id = u.user_id WHERE t.status = 'completed';
SELECT fa.attempt_id, fa.reason, fa.timestamp, pa.timestamp FROM flagged_attempts fa LEFT JOIN payment_attempts pa ON fa.attempt_id = pa.id WHERE fa.reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT u.username, COUNT(pa.id) AS num_attempts FROM users u LEFT JOIN payment_attempts pa ON u.user_id = pa.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING num_attempts >= 3 ORDER BY num_attempts DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT MAX(balance) FROM accounts;
SELECT event_date, event_type FROM security_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, balance FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT attempt_id, customer_id, attempt_date FROM login_attempts WHERE success = false ORDER BY attempt_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_date, event_type, details FROM security_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login Attempt' OR event_type = 'Password Change' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
